content: hey folks! i'm more jazzed about leaning Rust than i have been about any other language in recent memory, and a huge part of that is rust-analyzer. dev tools are a serious interest for me, and it looks like rust-analyzer has lots of exciting places for contributions. looking forward to helping out with things!
Hi @Nick Piepmeier! You may want to take a look at the #t-compiler/wg-rls-2.0 stream if you haven't already.
